pages.text:
Where Friendships Flourish and Families Come Together
Astor Creek Golf & Country Club, in the heart of the Astor Creek Community, will serve as a central gathering point for Members and their Guests. Enjoy everything from evenings watching the sunset over the Championship Golf Course to a romantic dinner in the Grille (Opening 2025). Something will be going on all the time, and your social calendar will be complete with Member activities for every age and interest.
Activities for all ages, couples & families
An active lifestyle is at the heart of the Astor Creek experience. Whether playing golf on the magnificently designed Golf Course, returning volleys on the Tennis Courts, honing your game at the Driving Range, or working up a sweat in the state-of-the-art Fitness & Wellness Center, Astor Creek will offer some of the highest-quality recreational facilities in the State.
World-Class Amenities & Golf Course
The Astor Creek Golf & Country Club Golf Course will be one of the finest designs in Florida, offering a natural beauty shaped by picturesque vistas and rolling terrain. The 7,000+ yard masterpiece moves through the Astor Creek Community and maintains a focus on natural design. The soon-to-be heralded practice facilities will include a best-in-class, 10,000 sq. ft. of putting surfaces, chipping, and bunker areas.
The magnificent Clubhouse, opening in 2025, will offer casual and fine dining opportunities with creative menus and welcoming Team Members. The Clubhouse will allow for the comforts of home with locker rooms for both the ladies and gentlemen.
Social Events at Astor Creek Golf & Country Club
The best times, the ones where memories are made, are the ones where you end the day with friends and family over a special meal. At Astor Creek Golf & Country Club, that is the spirit behind all our social events.
The weekly events calendar will be full of scheduled events for all Members to enjoy. Astor Creek supports an active golf community whose Members enjoy meeting new people, celebrating holidays in style, or learning new things.
The Club also offers chances to reconnect with old friends and family. If you desire an intimate setting for your social event, we'll arrange it exactly how you want it to be.
Broaden Your Outlook
Some of the Club's social events will be learning events. Astor Creek Members are sure to be a diverse, friendly set who enjoy new hobbies and meeting new people. To that end, the Club will proudly offer wine tastings, cooking classes, and more.
Alternatively, you can eventually join one of the regularly scheduled weekly gatherings that focus on a specific theme. For example, the Club will offer mahjong, bridge classes, and much more.
Full Resident Memberships available!
Invitational Membership is at full capacity and is not being offered at this time.
For additional information, please complete the inquiry form below.
Request Information
SharpSpring Form for Membership - Club Website

A New Events Space For Your Unforgettable Experience.
Your special occasions deserve special attention to detail that Astor Creek is known for providing. From a five-course dinner in the dining room to an elaborate ballroom gala or a starlit celebration in elegant outdoor locations, Astor Creek Golf & Country Club specializes in creating magnificent social celebrations, turning our wedding and special event locations in Port St. Lucie, FL, into spectacular affairs.
SharpSpring Form for Special Event/Wedding - Club Website
